item.title: Explaining machine learning models
item.description: Overview The data The problem Benchmark many models with caret Set crossvalidation parameters Build model data framework Train models Visualize the residuals Introducing DALEX explainers! Model performance Variable Importance Variable response Prediction breakdown Packages library(tidyverse) library(caret) library(magrittr) library(DALEX) Overview This blog will cover DALEX explainers. These are very useful when we need to validate a model or explain why a model made the prediction it made on an observation basis.
